text: b'Good discussion with @VeraJourova today. Taking the #MFF and #NextGenerationEU hostage puts Europe\xe2\x80\x99s economic recovery at risk. I support a solution that protects our shared values. #RuleOfLaw. https://t.co/g6FTw1po3r'

b'Today I\xc2\xa0stand with women experiencing violence. I see you. I hear & trust you. Please speak up and reach out for help. You are not alone. As a society, let\xe2\x80\x99s step up efforts to #orangetheworld & ensure that home is a safe place for each girl & woman. Stop the shadow pandemic. https://t.co/fUGBRAJh6H'

b"Ambitious #ClimateAction is a recipe for modern, prosperous and resilient economy & society. #NextGeneneration Funds a great opportunity to support digital and green transition. Slovakia's future must be greener and sustainable."

b'Be receptive to what is happening around you. Be alert when children are quiet. Trust their voice. I\xe2\x80\x99ve joined the drumming initiative so children\xe2\x80\x99s voices are heard. Because silence will not protect them from violence. #preventionofchildabuse https://t.co/PycvzKuQ7J'

b'There is no #Slovakia for or against face masks, for or against strict measures. We are one nation, one country, one community. As back in November 1989, we will better cope with the challenges of today, if we are united.'

b'The choices we make today will define us tomorrow. The #EU cannot defend the values we share - such as #RuleOfLaw - if we do not reach a shared understanding on what is really important. #Slovakia supports that benefits should come with responsibility. #MFF #NextGenerationEU'
b'I strongly condemn the killing of an unarmed protester Raman Bandarenka. Peaceful transition of power, not violence, is the way forward for #Belarus.'
b'Remembering heroes, we pay respect to all those who sacrificed so much to protect our freedom. #lestweforget https://t.co/mBYSwTHB33'
b'31 years ago, a new chapter of European history began. The fall of the #BerlinWall had put away decades of divisions to give way to European unity. Today, it is up to us to carry on this task.'

b'Congratulations @JoeBiden.\xc2\xa0I wish you & the American people strength to face challenges ahead of us.\xc2\xa0We share the same values of freedom, democracy and cooperation, which make our Transatlantic partnership unique and our unity strong.'

b'Deeply saddened by the shameful terrorist attack in #Vienna. My thoughts are with the families of the victims and the injured, and with the people of #Austria \xf0\x9f\x87\xa6\xf0\x9f\x87\xb9 We are united in standing up to hatred and terrorism.'

b'Recent abhorrent terrorist attacks in #France negate all values we stand for as Europeans. In these difficult times, #Slovakia stands in solidarity with our friend, partner and ally. There must be zero tolerance for extremism in any form. @EmmanuelMacron #Nice #SamuelPaty'

b'102 years ago, independent #Czechoslovakia was founded on values of humanism, democracy & progress. Today, Slovak\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 & Czech\xf0\x9f\x87\xa8\xf0\x9f\x87\xbf Republic are as close to each other as two sovereign states can be. We draw from this legacy as democratic nations united once again in the #EU and #NATO.'

b'Today,\xc2\xa0we unite in blue to mark #75UN. UN and responsible leadership remain the best answers to global challenges.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0We must safeguard principles of cooperation, solidarity & collective action to counter ignorance, selfish political interests or inaction. #climatecrisis #covid19 https://t.co/6GYDLKYAmr'

b'I spoke to President of Switzerland @s_sommaruga - my official visit next week to Bern has been postponed as #Covid19 forces us to change our plans and stay responsible. We need more cooperation to cope with the pandemics. https://t.co/7xJbZF0fuU'

b'It takes seconds to use a face mask, disinfection & to remember keeping distance. Seconds of respect can mean years of life for the elderly & most vulnerable. Please, behave responsibly so we can help keep the situation #COVID-19 under control. https://t.co/8eLQkBGMhj'

b'COVID-19 is not only attacking our physical health - it also greatly increases psychological suffering.  2020 #WorldMentalHealthDay is a reminder we need to invest more into mental health services and make them accessible for all. https://t.co/49zr8Ua34O'

b'Glad to speak with @SPendarovski in Bratislava. #Slovakia supports reforms in #NorthMacedonia, especially in Rule of Law and its EU accession. Our two countries are #NATO Allies and partners. Slovakian humanitarian aid leaving tomorrow to help MK address COVID-19. https://t.co/QBMyj1uMsI'

b'Glad to meet Sviatlana @Tsihanouskaya. Her determination to advance democratic change in #Belarus is inspiring. For this to happen, the regime should engage in open & meaningful dialogue with society. Violence and intimidation are unacceptable. https://t.co/iqGUgXyLVj'

b'We need to entrust technologies and technical equipment of our institutions to reliable hands \xe2\x80\x93 those of our Allies and partners. It is a matter of values, principles and national security, not of economic efficiency and lucrative business. #5G.'
b'We must stop undermining our institutions. We must replace questioning and criticism with support, defunding with improvement and withdrawing with more engagement. #Globsec2020'

b'We must make clear that respecting the rules and enjoying the benefits, including the EU funds, come always and strictly together. And that one without the other will not be possible. #Globsec2020 #RuleOfLaw https://t.co/7nSxwhSUCu'

b"Courage, vision and a true will of the people of Germany and their leaders 30 years ago were the stepping stones of freedom, unity and solidarity in Europe. Today, in time of growing divisions and polarisation this legacy mustn't be forgotten. #Germany #Reunification"

b'Our elders are source of wisdom & experience. It is our duty to make sure they are not left behind and that ageing comes with dignity, pleasure & easy access to everything they need. #InternationalDayOfOlderPeople #UNIDOP https://t.co/gfzGfK1Rzt'

b"Species and habitats are disappearing at an alarming rate. Conservation of our planet's #biodiversity should be a priority as our very survival is at risk. It must be a part of the solution to the climate crisis, not it's collateral damage. #UN #BiodiversitySummit @UNBiodiversity https://t.co/BbxRdDPalt"

b'I have joined #LeadersPledge4Nature to reverse\xc2\xa0#biodiversity\xc2\xa0loss by 2030. This global challenge needs urgent action and responsibility, not ignorance.\xc2\xa0#4Nature4Us #naturebasedsolution https://t.co/0a2iGOfBeb'

b"Glad to welcome @ZelenskyyUa in Bratislava.#Ukraine-#Slovakia relations are very good & hold so much more potential. We agreed to open Uzhorod airport right on SK-UA border for international flights. Reaffirmed support for #Ukraine's reforms, its EU ambitions & sovereignty. https://t.co/isY7l0v6BR"
b'We all know what to do to address the climate crisis and save our planet. But we need a genuine will to act together to make it a real priority.'

b'The spread of authoritarian disease is a threat to all of us. No crisis can be an excuse for suppressing human rights and liberties. Too often we see people intimidated, beaten or threatened on their lives. As recently in Belarus, or in the Navalnyj case.'
b'The provision of COVID-19 vaccine to anyone on this planet should be a sign o humanity, not a matter of economic profit.'

b'My #UNGA2020 address: To succeed as mankind, we need solidarity, compassion, responsible leadership and trust. Free and independent media, renowned experts, scientists, and active civil society to be the guardians of these princples.'
b'Glad to be the first woman on this year\xc2\xb4s #UNGA2020 speakers list. As the 51st in total. We, the UN, can do better. https://t.co/m2JBqAtkFK'

b"Sign language is equal to any spoken language. It is part of our linguistic and cultural diversity- let's do more to create equal conditions for its usage. Slovak Sign Language is for Everyone! #IDSignLanguages #Globalleaderschallenge https://t.co/JMgRxNmqvA"

b'Supporting public transport & #MobilityWeek by announcing stop in every bus crossing the square next to the Presidential Palace this year. Our next stop should be to #BeatClimateChange. https://t.co/VchSZ0Mkv3'

b'Glad to meet again @vanderbellen and enjoyed my first meeting with President Milanovi\xc4\x87 of Croatia. Always good to have pleasant discussions with colleagues and friends. This time in Vienna on the margins of @ClimateAWS https://t.co/SaPbjM88AY'

b'Our planet is getting hotter, but our solutions are not cool at all. We can continue experimenting or act now. My office will be carbon neutral by 2030. Slovakia will do the same by 2050. We want to be part of the solution @ClimateAW #ClimateAction https://t.co/tREAjFcXF5'
b'The future will be green, resilient and sustainable. https://t.co/CTQi9vtyzU'

b'Spoke w/ Svetlana Alexijevi\xc4\x8d - brave  woman, standing in defence of freedom & democracy for people of #Belarus. I expressed solidarity & support to all calling for free & fair elections. My respect for peacefulness of protests & genuine will to live life in freedom & dignity. https://t.co/E5RSbMJOfv'

b"DemocracyDay2020 let\xe2\x80\x99s remember governments\xe2\x80\x99 authority isn\xe2\x80\x99t just based on the majority. Democracy means a guarantee of rights of those in minority, the weak and the vulnerable. I'm especially thinking of people in #Belarus and everyone who suffers from authoritarian oppression."

b'Presidential office commits to climate neutrality by 2030. Reducing own CO2 footprint through renewable energy&green solutions in buildings, mobility, going zero waste, banning plastics. Digitalization, local food, planting trees&more. Join in, change is possible #climate #leader https://t.co/yj71koY1gu'

b'The gravest crimes often begin with words of hatred or discrimination. Today, #Slovakia marks the Day of victims of the Holocaust and of racial violence. It is our duty to remind ourselves that when it comes to our rights and freedoms, we are all equal. https://t.co/l36eBqEd1g'

b'In #Slovakia only, we could avoid around 5.000 premature deaths annually. We are joining the world to mark the #UN International day for #CleanAir. In fighting air pollution, we are saving lives&contribute to improved health of citizens and ecosystems #WorldCleanAirDay #BlueSkies https://t.co/dIE0zh5Lvm'

b'First-ever own honey bottling successful. All made-in by Presidential Palace&Garden. A perfect genuine gift for my colleagues presidents. #bee #biodiversity #sustainability #environment https://t.co/rxwf72YGHl'

b'We must respect\xc2\xa0today\xe2\x80\x99s court ruling in the case of Jan #Kuciak and his fiance Martina\xc2\xa0and trust that those who ordered the killing will be identified & convicted. That in the end, justice will be served. I wish all the strength to their families. https://t.co/mSFxG6cImG'

b'#Slovakia stands by the Czech Republic. #EU-#China relations are based on dialogue and mutual respect. Threats directed at one of the EU members and its representatives contradict the very essence of our partnership and as such are unacceptable.'
b'40 years since the founding of #Poland\xe2\x80\x99s #Solidarnosc: brave steps that led to the end of communism and the fall of the Iron Curtain.\xc2\xa0#Solidarnosc40 #Solidarity40'

b'I strongly condemn the poisoning of @navalny. Such actions must be absolutely unacceptable in any society that respects the fundamental dignity of human beings. I wish Alexey strength to feel better soon.'
b"From today we live on ecological debt. When will we change it? Let's move \xc2\xa0#EarthOvershootDay together. https://t.co/mGa7TL8xaH"

b'August \xe2\x80\x9868 is a dark chapter in our history. The Soviet-led invasion halted nascent democratic process. Today, it is a strong reminder that no country has the right to decide other nations\xe2\x80\x99 future. https://t.co/qUtWlgLbT3'

b'Good discussion with @HeikoMaas on #NextGenEU, Covid-19, situation in #Belarus and relations with #Russia. It is important to exchange and share views with our strategic partner and Ally. https://t.co/9wnzvXIXo4'

b'Presidential palace lit in solidarity with those who are peacefully defending freedom and demanding free, fair and democratic elections in #Belarus. Violence must be replaced by meaningful dialogue, openness and reconciliation. https://t.co/azug114Wdg'

b'I condemn the use of force and repressions against people of #Belarus freely exercising their freedom of speech and assembly. Fundamental freedoms and human rights must always be respected and protected.'
b'#HirosimaPeaceMemorial reminds us that humankind should never again experience misuse of nuclear power. https://t.co/g0BNy9zVxW'
b'My thoughts are with the people of #Lebanon. My deepest sympathies to those who lost their loved ones in devastating explosion in #Beirut. Wishing all the injured strength and speedy recovery.'

b'As we pay tribute to the Roma & Sinti victims of the Holocaust on #RomaGenocideRemembranceDay #2August, we need to address inequalities that Romani communities still experience. We are in this together, with Romani men & Romani women #NaBister https://t.co/Jg2RpzONfM'

b'Used plastic bottles into new green fibers & high-quality secondary materials. 100 new green jobs created. Investing in #circulareconomy means investing into our future. I have visited innovative greentech company in #Slovakia #upcycling #sustainability #greeneconomy https://t.co/nipyMyeqb6'

b'Couple of highlights from yesterday\xe2\x80\x99s visit of @BorutPahor - from our discussions in Presidential garden, through opening of joint Slovak-Slovenian business forum, to laying wreaths by Gate of Freedom Memorial. Mr. President, thank you for the pleasant company and see you soon. https://t.co/EUgixG4XZZ'

b'Businesses are the driving force of innovation: this is why I am glad to make the idea of Slovak-Slovenian companies coming together a reality. We need our smart businesses to forge partnerships and develop joint projects to adress sustainability and digitalisation. #NextGenEU https://t.co/hH4T81Oeyi'

b'Warm welcome @BorutPahor to Bratislava. We are meeting to discuss how to contribute together to a strong, more united and green #EU and help our countries transform into innovative and sustainable economies and societies \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xae\n#NextGenEU #GreenDeal https://t.co/sjjHNu64TS'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cTrust the truth, live the truth, defend the truth.\xe2\x80\x9d The words of Milan Rastislav \xc5\xa0tef\xc3\xa1nik, one of the founders of democratic Czechoslovakia in 1918. He was born 140 years ago. https://t.co/VReRyExQtb'

b"Another historic moment for the #EU's unity, solidarity, stability and prosperity. Now it\xe2\x80\x99s important to make the best use of it, making the EU stronger \xe2\x80\x94 while preserving our democratic values and #RuleOfLaw and making our economies greener and more efficient.\n#NGEU #MFF"

b'Today welcoming my good neighbour and friend President @vanderbellen in \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0. Very inspiring discussion. Agreed we have to do our best to turn post-pandemic EU recovery into an opportunity for greener and more sustainable future of our countries. #NextGenerationEU #StrongerTogether https://t.co/tsi95ue4wC'

b'I\xc2\xa0wish President @AndrzejDuda all the best for his second term & in uniting the country after elections & close results. \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 & \xf0\x9f\x87\xb5\xf0\x9f\x87\xb1 are good neighbours and Allies. We need to work towards strong, prosperous & green EU, based on values of freedom, democracy and rule of law.'

b'As we mark 25 years since #Srebrenica genocide, we honour the memory of victims & offer our condolences to their families & survivors. Remembering the past, we also focus on our joint future - based on reconciliation and European perspective.\n#NeverAgain #Srebrenica25'

b'At the meeting with Slovakia\xe2\x80\x99s @Europarl_EN MEPs from across political spectrum, we agreed that preparation of our #NextGenEU #RecoveryPlan requires a whole-of-government effort. Time is of essence. #EUGreenDeal https://t.co/mrkX5PqEmM'

b'Mayors of V4 capitals are calling for #GreenRecovery. Citizens rightfully ask for sustainable future and cities play a vital role. Very pleased to see strong support for ambitious climate goals for 2030 and beyond. #EUGreenDeal #ClimateAction https://t.co/YzUvIUHPgP'

b'Good discussion w/ #Environment Minister Budaj. I welcome ambitious greening of #Slovakia\xe2\x80\x99s recovery plan. Strong climate action, biodiversity protection & improved air quality are priorities; more transparency on environmental legacies & immediate action is a must. #EUGreenDeal https://t.co/1vDi5hSDK4'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI go with my head up... I love this country, I love the people. I leave honestly, with no hatred towards you\xe2\x80\x9d. Milada Hor\xc3\xa1kov\xc3\xa1 was executed 70 years ago in a show trial by then communist Czechoslovakia. We shall never forget. https://t.co/6op3ady0wT'
b'No one is safe until everyone is safe\n#GlobalGoalUnite https://t.co/QX9mMxW1Je'

b'Representing #Slovakia at today\xe2\x80\x99s global pledging summit #GlobalGoalUnite to end #coronavirus. We need globalization of compassion & solidarity to provide tests, vaccines & treatment for COVID-19: because no one is safe until everyone is safe. https://t.co/o46iK3uJyr'

b'Today we celebrate 75 years of the @UN Charter - first truly global vision of peace, justice and dignity for every human being. We should do everything in our power to support the #UN to address the challenges we face. #ClimateAction #RuleOfLaw #GlobalGoals #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/vM7dfZVHXd'

b'Glad to speak to UNSG @antonioguterres. Agreed that in post #COVID19 recovery we need to focus on climate change, rule of law & vulnerable groups, especially victims of gender-based violence. #UN is vital in mobilising our global response. Unless everyone is safe, no one is safe. https://t.co/0tjZklIN7z'
b'@ZelenskyyUa Dear Volodymyr, thank you.'

b'Our best brains must come together to craft a vision and transform our society and economy. A plan that makes Slovakia leaner, greener and more modern, I stressed @ meeting with Deputy PM Remisova. We agreed digital transformation is indispensable for our future. #NextGenEU #MFF https://t.co/LVM2suySOT'

b'My first year in the Office. It has been a challenging one, as will be those to come. But I will continue to do everything in my power to make #Slovakia fairer, greener & better country. I am once again offering my expertise, empathy and activism. https://t.co/kE36VNlX1S'

b'#Slovakia is heavily hit by strong economic downturn due to #COVID19. We are very exposed to international trade & export-oriented economy needs a hand to walk through harder times. I have discussed next steps w/ economic experts. A robust #EU recovery plan is a real solution https://t.co/lrRkqIpX7m'

b'#AnnualAddress #NextGenerationEU offers #Slovakia a historic chance to leap ahead and become greener, leaner, and more modern. We must use this opportunity strategically and wisely. This is why our politicians have a historic responsibility.'

b'#AnnualAddress We are only as strong as our ability to protect the most vulnerable: the elderly, those in need and those dependent on the help of others. Helping these people means helping the society as a whole.'
b'#AnnualAddress Justice must remain blind. You should only adopt laws you would want your opponents to adopt. And you should adopt them in a manner that you would also want your opponents to use.'

b'#AnnualAddress We should lift the restrictions once they are no longer necessary with the same speed with which we introduced them. Any restriction is a means to something, not an end in itself. The rights and freedoms of our citizens what is at stake.'

b'#AnnualAddress #COVID19 pandemics has cruelly exposed persistent problems that experts had long warned about. We see what happens if we neglect them. This must be a wake-up call for all of us. Let us use the opportunity to make solving these problems a priority now. https://t.co/KH6CKCNUB1'
b'Let us celebrate together #WorldEnvironmentDay2020! We stand united for better future, we care for our environment #sustainabilitty #ForNature #climateaction https://t.co/DNQIggGuiS'
b'New co-workers in the Presidential Palace. #Bee engaged! #beesinthecity #biodiversity https://t.co/tGFpLoOiMC'

b"\xe2\x80\x9cAll grown-ups were once children-but only few of them remember it,\xe2\x80\x9d said de Saint-Exup\xc3\xa9ry. Let's keep our minds as curious & open as those of our children. Wishing our young ones happy International Children's Day as today, they return to nurseries & schools after 3 months. https://t.co/plsPYTqnER"

b'#COVID19 must not overshadow other challenges. I visited Eastern #Slovakia to learn how drought impacts livelihoods of farmers, food prices & food security. Preserving biodiversity and investing in green tech key to our success.\xc2\xa0\n#climatecrisis https://t.co/826CNPUysB'

b'Proposed #EUBudget and #NextGenerationEU - true sign of solidarity and historic chance to make the #EU greener, more sustainable and responsible. One of the most important tasks for Slovakia and the EU in the years to come. #StrongerTogether.'

b'No one should be left behind. As we mark 10th anniversary of European Diversity Charter, we must strive for more diverse and inclusive workplaces. Glad that my office is a signatory. https://t.co/95gJO67W6Y #EUDiversityMonth #UnitedInDiversity @EU_Justice'

b'I discussed with experts, prosecutors, judges and politicians  reform of public prosecution service. Important to rebuild the trust of society in justice and rule of law. Transparency & accountability of police, prosecution service and courts is key to make it happen. #ruleoflaw https://t.co/cDcv0qh6qy'

b'Pleasure talking to \xe2\x81\xa6@ZelenskyyUa\xe2\x81\xa9: #Slovakia and #Ukraine remain solid partners and friends. Glad we could help Ukraine in fighting the pandemic. I hope to host Mr President in Slovakia soon and to further develop our close relations. https://t.co/h7lAbcyyTd'

b'We cannot afford to lose a day to protect #Biodiversity and #ecosystems. Decision to restore environment is our collective responsibility towards nature and people. Happy #BiodiversityDay! @UNBiodiversity @EU_Commission @EUgreendeal'

b'"If something isn\xe2\x80\x99t blatantly impossible, then there must be a way of doing it", said Sir Nicholas Winton, a humble gentleman who saved the lives of almost 700 Czechoslovak children during the 2WW. He was born 111 years ago. The power of good is timeless.\nPhoto: TASR/AP https://t.co/netNoRjwxG'

b'It has taken too long. But finally I could meet with people that have been here for those in need, tirelessly and bravely working countless hours to extend helping hand. My heartful thanks to all of you! Proud to see so much humanity and care for each other these difficult days. https://t.co/QXhtJsWr7I'

b"The crisis has taught us we are only as strong as our most vulnerable citizens. I\xc2\xa0listened to annual report of Ombudsperson at Slovak Parliament today. Addressing people's concerns and injustice is key to strengthening their trust in justice, state and its functioning. https://t.co/2lqI1FTHse"

b'Glad to speak to President of #Georgia\xc2\xa0@Zourabichvili_S. I confirmed strong support of Slovakia to territorial integrity and sovereignty of Georgia & commitment to strengthening our bilateral cooperation and #EU #NATO relations.'
b'We will keep the safeguarding of our security, of our citizens and infrastructure as the guiding principle in all decisions, including foreign investments and economic activities in #Slovakia.'

b'We will actively prevent dissemination of disinformation and propaganda. We will support further strengthening of European security and defence, while keeping #NATO the main pillar of our security and collective defence.'

b'The defence of freedom, democracy, rule of law and international norms, including protection of sovereignty and territorial integrity will be the guiding principles in pursuing our interests in bilateral and multilateral relations.'
b'It is our vital and strategic interest to further advance our #EU and #NATO memberships.'
b'To commemorate #EuropeDay, we agreed today a joint Declaration on\xc2\xa0Foreign, European and Security Policy with\xc2\xa0Speaker of Parliament and Prime Minister.'

b'By celebrating #EuropeDay we celebrate decades of peace, freedom and justice on our continent. Lets make sure that by making concrete steps of solidarity and bold decisions we will build a stronger and more successful #EU. \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0\xf0\x9f\x87\xaa\xf0\x9f\x87\xba'

b'Today, we express our utmost gratitude to all brave men and women who helped defeat nazism and paved the way for the world and Europe we know today. Their sacriface shall never be forgotten. https://t.co/WaC3HAO21p'
b'Life has not yet fully returned to normal \xe2\x80\x94 but glad that the garden of the presidential palace has once again opened for public. #UnitedAgainstCoronavirus https://t.co/Y2xLCTbuv1'
b'Glad Slovakia has become part of such important effort and joined  #GlobalResponse to develop a #coronavirus vaccine by pledging 750,000 EUR to this end. #UnitedAgainstCoronavirus'

b'My sincere congratulations to #Latvia \xf0\x9f\x87\xb1\xf0\x9f\x87\xbb on 30 years of independence and your successful journey as an independent democratic country. After years of occupation, our people know the price of freedom. \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 shares your joy as your close #EU #NATO partner and ally! @Rigas_pils'

b'Celebrating 16yrs since Slovakia joined #EU. Proud member of community of values of freedom, democracy and rule of law. EU membership has made us stronger and prosperous. The current crisis can only be overcome if we keep our unity and solidarity rock-solid. We will do our share. https://t.co/dr0YZB31Cc'

b'Today at press conference w/ foreign minister @IvanKorcok I stressed we leaders have important role to honestly explain to our people who are our friends and allies helping to survive and recover. #EU and its member states are such ones. We can only survive this crisis together. https://t.co/TOa9LiVOKr'

b'Spoke with EC President @vonderleyen. We need to address #Covid_19 and to support our economies. To fund joint research of the vaccine and make it available to everyone on the planet. Agreed we need a robust intervention to be #strongerTogether. https://t.co/b2PbzN0Rhl'

b'Spo\xc5\xa1tovani gospod predsednik @BorutPahor, dragi Borut, prisr\xc4\x8dna hvala za iskrene besede podpore, solidarnosti in prijateljstva. Sloveniji in vsem njenim dr\xc5\xbeavljanom \xc5\xbeelim veliko mo\xc4\x8di v sedanji krizi. Veselim se \xc4\x8dim prej\xc5\xa1njega sre\xc4\x8danja z vami.\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xae #solidarity #heartstogether https://t.co/UIA6HCPe0M'

b'#EarthDay2020 We are in debt to this planet. We\xc2\xa0need to change ourselves: how we do business, how we handle natural resources. It\xe2\x80\x99s time to join forces to pay our dues. It\xe2\x80\x99s time to protect #biodiversity and #environment. https://t.co/SiMGX4OhNw'

b'Presidential Palace lit in the colours of #ilTricolore last night to show solidarity with our #EU partner and friend. Glad #Slovakia will provide medical support and PPE to #Italy in these hard times.\n#HeartsTogether #COVID19 https://t.co/H2tOhlBbtq'

b'My heartfelt gratitude to @Pontifex Pope Francis for our phone conversation today. #Slovakia is thankful for Your ceaseless perseverance in bringing hope and encouragement in these difficult times.  \n#HeartsTogether #PrayTogether #PopeFrancis https://t.co/3tL23Vwsk7'
b"This year, Easter may be different as we can't be together as much as we would wish - but the substance remains the same: we celebrate love and life. #HappyEaster to everyone.\n#HeartsTogether"

b'Glad to appoint Mr. Ivan Kor\xc4\x8dok as the new \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0Foreign Minister. I am confident that his experience and international reputation will be a guarantee of the unwavering pro-European and pro-Atlantic course of the Slovak Foreign Policy.'

b'#InternationalRomaDay\xc2\xa0reminds us that we should never leave\xc2\xa0anyone behind. The current #crisis has shown a\xc2\xa0lot of #solidarity, #respect and #care for each other. #HeartsTogether #EU4ROMA #RomaEquality #COVID19 https://t.co/a0R49D3AJs'

b'Nowadays, we can\xe2\x80\x99t hug or touch, nor can we shake hands with our friends, relatives or parents. I personally miss also the contact with you. Right now, we can\xe2\x80\x99t be #together, but we are still #HeartsTogether.\n#SrdcomSpolu #SocialDistancing #President #Slovakia #COVID #COVID19 https://t.co/toN0TkqKBQ'
b'Best wishes for a speedy recovery to @BorisJohnson.'

b'Together, we are facing a great #challenge. To address the #CoronavirusPandemic, some of our freedoms might be temporarily restricted. But we shall not lose sight of our #democracy. It cannot become a collateral damage.\n#COVID19 #coronavirus'
b'Welcome to the 30th #NATO ally North Macedonia \xf0\x9f\x87\xb2\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 #StrongerTogether'

b'My first meeting with the new defence minister: no change in our #NATO committments, armed forces prepared to help against #COVID19. Slovakia has a new strongly pro-European and pro-Atlantic government. https://t.co/FEgIqX1XQM'

b'I wish every success to PM Igor Matovic and his new government of #Slovakia. Entrusted with great responsibility to lead our country in these difficult times, in unity and with compassion. \n#PrimeMinister #president #government #Covid_19 https://t.co/KLEeAtulLz'

b'Honoured to speak today in Brno (\xf0\x9f\x87\xa8\xf0\x9f\x87\xbf) on the 100th anniversary of the first Czecho-Slovak constitution which laid the foundations of our constitutional judicial tradition. My thanks to Pavel Rychetsky and @usoud_official for the opportunity to celebrate this day together. https://t.co/sBi9SIAWfZ'
b'Embracing climate transition as an opportunity: I welcome first ever #EUClimateLaw; closer to ambitious move of net zero emissions by 2050 and ahead of #COP26.'
b'In #2020elections, #Slovakia voted for change, for more justice and against corruption. My congratulations to Igor Matovic and his party on the victory.'

b'Today, we mark the 75th anniversary of the Flying of the Flag over #IwoJima. One of the flag-raisers was sgt.Michael Strank, born in Jarabina, Slovakia. We shall never forget their sacrifice and remember all those fighting for our freedom today. #WeAreIwo #IwoJima75 #WWII75 https://t.co/psk2vF0zqD'

b'Two years since we lost Jan Kuciak and Martina Ku\xc5\xa1n\xc3\xadrov\xc3\xa1. Two awful murders that moved the whole society to ask for justice and resist those, who want to abuse it. We shall not forget. #allforjan https://t.co/SxjJeGGybY'

b'My full support to the European Public Prosecutor\xe2\x80\x99s Office to start its work soon. Glad to have discussed #theRuleOfLaw and the prospects for the #EPPO with the European Chief Prosecutor Laura K\xc3\xb6vesi. #EU #solidarity #justice https://t.co/PwZeUnKagh'
b'Glad to have participated in #MSC2020: my full speech on why political leaders need to defend #theRuleofLaw here: https://t.co/ZFgiB4446p https://t.co/W13g2C1ikU'
b'We as political leaders have a responsibility to unite \xe2\x80\x94 and not divide our societies into north vs south, east vs west, city vs countryside, or elites vs the people. #MSC2020'

b'Europe\xe2\x80\x99s strength lies in protection of freedom and democracy. When someone promises to bring order, let\xe2\x80\x99s check if they don\xe2\x80\x99t see democracy and pluralism as obstacles to their goals. #MSC2020'
b'The judiciary must stand on two pillars - independence and accountability. They must reinforce \xe2\x80\x94 not endanger \xe2\x80\x94 one other. #MSC2020 #Visegrad4'
b'Justice implies a balance between rights and obligations. The debate on linking #EUbudget and respect for shared values is legitimate.\xc2\xa0#MSC2020'
b'We must protect our citizens, but also our values. If political leaders resign on defending #TheRuleOfLaw, a #EuropeThatProtects ceases to exist. #MSC2020 https://t.co/yHn8MJZ9Ad'
b'Glad to be joining the #MSC2020 debate today on how to build a #Europe that protects. I\xe2\x80\x99ll speak about political leaders\xe2\x80\x99 responsibility to defend and protect #theRuleOfLaw.'
b'We are losing a valuable #EU member today. But we are not parting with a friend, an ally and a close partner. Wishing the #UK all the best in the next chapter of our friendship. #Brexit #BrexitDay'

b"My respect to all women and men in uniform and their civilian colleagues for their service to the Slovak people. Our armed forces and their capabilities are the embodiment of our #NATO committments, as I addresed the Annual commanders' conference today. https://t.co/cHsV7u1Odl"
b'Fascism is still alive in our societies. We shall never allow it to return to power. #Auschwitz75 #NotOnMyWatch https://t.co/YffPJJw3nA'
b'RT @PresidentRuvi: Delighted to welcome President @ZuzanaCaputova of #Slovakia who accepted my invitation to mark the 75th anniversary of t\xe2\x80\xa6'

b'Glad to meet @PresidentRuvi. Friendship between Slovakia & Israel remains historically close & strong. Together we continue to stand against every form of extremism & antisemitism & keep the remembrance of Holocaust as a testimony for the sake of our future. #UnitedinMemory75 https://t.co/j8hOU5U4US'

b'Words of hatred rarely end with just words. We shall never forget milions of lives of people lost by the most terrible crime in history. Honoured to be at #worldholocaustforum to commemorate 75\xc2\xa0yrs of liberation of Auschwitz-Birkenau. We shall never allow this to happen again. https://t.co/noZ6XhDH2T'

b'My visit to #NATO\xc2\xa0Explosive Ordnance Disposal\xc2\xa0Centre of Excellence, located in Tren\xc4\x8d\xc3\xadn, Slovakia. Glad to see Slovak and foreign professionals working shoulder to shoulder to strengthen our collective defence and Allied unity. https://t.co/BmfQmQhBTX'

b'In climate agenda, I wish to see, despite last years\xc2\xb4 disappointment, the global agreement reached.  \nGlobally, our focus must be stopping climate change and fighting inequality. Solution to uncontrolled migration is not bigger fences, it is improving people\xe2\x80\x99s lives.'
b'I wish peace to the Ukrainian nation. And for the international law, sovereignty and territorial integrity to be finally respected.'
b'We need to further strengthen our defence against anyone trying to test our security and not to be naive about possible misuse of new technologies or hybrid warfare.'
b'I hope to see European unity strengthened at home, and our influence and resolve abroad. We need serious changes in how we do the European foreign and security policy.'

b'My New Year\xc2\xb4s address to diplomatic corps:\nI am sad to see conflict becoming a working method. We need to start reconstructing our security order. Rules are there to follow, not to ignore. https://t.co/lZzWA7lcvn'
b'Terrible news about the passenger plane crash over Tehran: my deepest condolences to families and loved ones of the victims.'
b'Congratulations to Zoran Milanovi\xc4\x87, President-elect of #Croatia. Looking forward to our future cooperation.'

b'Fully agree with @antonioguterres: there is no time to lose and no effort to spare. A deal is possible \xe2\x80\x94 if we stay focused on substance and act as the science tells us to. https://t.co/lwFFQPHLmc'

b'United we stand to adress Climate crisis. Race we can win only together. EU Carbon neutrality 2050 shows the strength to make our continent an inspiration to follow. Glad Slovakia is the first V4 country to commit to 2050 goal. We hope to make the #EUGreenDeal a reality soon.'
b'30yrs ago we could freely cross the border that had been closed for decades. Thank you President #vanderbellen for remembering our first journey to see the free world. https://t.co/WP7ZlNZDYI'

b'S hlbok\xc3\xbdm z\xc3\xa1rmutkom som prijala spr\xc3\xa1vu o tragickej a nezmyselnej stre\xc4\xbebe \xc3\xbato\xc4\x8dn\xc3\xadka v nemocnici v Ostrave. V mene ob\xc4\x8danov Slovenskej republiky, aj v mene svojom, som vyjadrila \xc3\xbaprimn\xc3\xba s\xc3\xbastras\xc5\xa5 prezidentovi Zemanovi, rodin\xc3\xa1m a bl\xc3\xadzkym obet\xc3\xad a zranen\xc3\xbdm \xc5\xbeel\xc3\xa1m skor\xc3\xa9 uzdravenie.\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0\xf0\x9f\x87\xa8\xf0\x9f\x87\xbf'
b'RT @mashagessen: In which there is hope for the continent, and I talked to her. Zuzana Caputova, the President of Slovakia, Voices Her Coun\xe2\x80\xa6'

b'#NATOat70. Our meeting in London proved our strength: to have frank discussions and stand united in facing threats and challenges to our security. For Slovakia, NATO remains the main pillar of our national, European and Transatlantic security https://t.co/piukNNGoH9'

b'Each year, more than 400,000 Europeans die prematurely because of air pollution. Today, \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 is hosting #CleanAirEU forum: let\xe2\x80\x99s make concrete steps to improve air quality for all.'
b'Today standing with women, girls & human rights defenders to start #16days of activism to end violence against women. #orangetheworld #sayNoStopVAW'

b'Congratulations to @KlausIohannis to the re-election as the President of Romania. Glad to see your strong commitment to the rule of law, democracy and European values that has inspired so many Romanians. I look forward to our further cooperation.'

b'30 years ago, desire for freedom and dignity brought young people in Slovakia to the streets. This non-violent protests in Bratislava and Prague triggered the #VelvetRevolution. Today, it is our  obligation to carry their message and be the guardians of freedom and democracy. https://t.co/J81HE9bYIW'

b'Fall of Berlin Wall together with the revolutionary changes in V4 is a fascinating story of desire for freedom and democracy. Glad to commemorate it together. Thank you President Steinmeier for  hosting us in Berlin today. #BerlinWall30 https://t.co/GIQpmbsRQu'
b'EU must aspire to become a true geopolitical power, but NATO is and should remain the backbone of our security on both banks of the Atlantic. #NATOLondon #NATOMeeting #WeAreNATO'

b'Every child deserves safe environment to thrive #foreverychild #30CRC #UNICEF. When I was a child, I dreamed of planting and arranging flowers. Now, my message to the children of Slovakia is to be attentive towards each other as well as to the nature. https://t.co/0kWb0HImSQ'

b'We mark Council of Europe 70th anniversary. Mission of human rights democracy & rule of law more relevant than ever. For Europe to be whole and free all @CoE states and PACE members shall share responsibility to not forget & safeguard these values against those who undermine them'

b'Honored to be present at the Enthronment Ceremony of the Emperor Naruhito today. May the new era of Reiwa bring prosperity and harmony to all people of Japan. \xf0\x9f\x87\xaf\xf0\x9f\x87\xb5\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0'

b"We'll commemorate 100 years of diplomatic relations between Slovakia & Japan next year. With PM @AbeShinzo we discused how to further improve them. Innovations, new technologies & renewable sources of energy are important to address climate crisis & help environmental protection. https://t.co/75RhclESDF"

b'I am disappointed to see we reached no consensus on Northern Macedonia \xf0\x9f\x87\xb2\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 and Albania \xf0\x9f\x87\xa6\xf0\x9f\x87\xb1. We need to encourage and support reforms, not dampen hopes.'

b'Proud to represent Slovakia that is committed to Open Government & Civil Society Participation. Today at #OrbisCivitates Conference attended by 240CSOs, I declared to be always protecting & supporting free civil society. https://t.co/XMYx6LGlC9'
b'The view on situation in #Slovakia and my story from the other bank of the Atlantic, written by @anneapplebaum. https://t.co/JCIdfeoZWt'

b"My full support to #EU efforts & today's conclusions on Syria. Turkey's offensive military actions in Syria should stop immediately. They only lead to more violence & destabilization. Only political process can bring peace, security & stability & prevent humanitarian catastrophe."

b'2nd day of V4 summit with colleagues from Slovenia & Serbia. Confirmed our continued support to keep the EU door open. As our countries in the past, candidates need credible perspective. But their sustained commitment to rule of law and other criteria is absolutely essential. https://t.co/LEDbYSxepz'

b'Open discussion w/ my Visegrad colleagues in L\xc3\xa1ny \xf0\x9f\x87\xa8\xf0\x9f\x87\xbf on V4 role in EU. We need constructive proposals & see opportunities in new EU priorities - green economy, digitalisation, solidarity - to face challenges ahead - modernisation & environmental sustainability of our economies. https://t.co/fGtlcUvKEg'
b'Full steam to join #V4 Presidents in Prague. #travellinggreen https://t.co/vdMZFlJHfi'
b'We agreed on urgency to adressed the #ClimateCrisis together with @antonioguterres. Glad he appreciated concrete contribution & ambitious plans of #Slovakia. @UN #UNGA https://t.co/WifodWTRKo'

b'Great to meet today UN Special Coordinator for Lebanon @UNJanKubis. We discussed situation in Middle East, #Peace & #Security, #ClimateAction, #SDGs. Proud that Slovakia has such personality taking part in fulfilling the immense mission of the @UN. https://t.co/INN6O4bDUM'
b'Glad to discuss priorities of @UN_PGA & present our ambitious plans to contribute to #ClimateAction. https://t.co/44LjiiWNcz'

b'All achievements by @UN have one in common - respect for rules. If one country strips territory of another, it is not to be mistaken for peacemaking. Suppressing human rights must not to be confused with fight against extremism. We need strong UN - guardian of our rules & trust.'

b'Speaking today at the #UNGA2019. Our future rests on our ability to restore broken trust. The best way to be patriotic lies not in national egoism, but in cooperation. And our climate action will be a major test. If we succeed, it can be a new start for our international system. https://t.co/qMcQdmoMoc'
b'Very glad to meet my colleague President @KerstiKaljulaid at the #UNGA2019 to exchange views on our common priorities of climate, rule of law and support for Ukraine. https://t.co/tZ5MqXyS21'

b'Meeting with President @niinisto, strong advocate for more climate ambition. Together with the Finnish EU Presidency @EU2019FI we share the vision to make Europe the first climate neutral continent. #UNGA #ClimateAction https://t.co/oJkdNoRZYQ'

b'We must do everything in our power to eradicate sexual exploitation & abuse, and to protect the victims. As a member of the Circle of Leaders I fully support the call by the UNSG @antonioguterres to make this goal reality. @UN #HonouringOurValues #UNGA https://t.co/a1w9Ej8T1Q'

b'#UNGA2019. Looking forward to meet and listen to the leaders of other countries. The mission of the UN more important than ever - the values of human rights, peace and sustainable development remain in the centre of our global action. https://t.co/MvsJBxuqGi'

b'We are living the best times in history, but we forgot to pay the bill. We are in debt to this planet. To address the climate crisis while living in this denial, will lead to our failure. protecting our environment means being human. #ClimateAction #UN #UNGA https://t.co/FiuRjFBQ4J'
b'Sensless to drive few blocks when I can walk to speak at #ClimateAction summit. #UN #UNGA https://t.co/3tqgRLzI6r'

b'We shall never forget and shall never let anyone steal the freedom and democracy from us again. Because we know the price of losing it. Our successes are a shared story of a genuine will and empathy on both banks of the Atlantic. https://t.co/W4103mLWnd'

b'Spoke at #Globsec Gala Dinner in #NYC. After #30yearsofdemocracy we know that it cannot be put on an autopilot. Without our engagement, without invisible, everyday work to defend our values, democracy erodes. https://t.co/WJCtvAv2dr'
b'Leaving for NY #ClimateAction summit & #UNGA. Taking with me the message of our youth #ClimateStrike #FridaysForFuture https://t.co/nvgTq7tDQF'
b"Glad to support President @vanderbellen's Initiative for more #ClimateAmbition. #UN #ClimateAction https://t.co/nKysz8nByh"

b'Ukraine and Slovakia are close partners & friends. We discussed w/ @ZelenskyyUa how we can together expand our relations, w/ fighting corruption & infrastructure as priorities. Slovakia will continue supporting Ukraine, its European path, territorial integrity & sovereignty. https://t.co/JdRtnyw9UJ'

b'Honoured to meet our successful Romani uni students of engineering, natural & social sciences. Yet, efforts to ensure equal opportunities for each child must be reinforced to make such stories common. We need to keep #romainclusion and fighting #antigypsyism also at the EU level. https://t.co/cLs4hvZphj'
b'Congratulations to @MarosSefcovic: As Europe gets ready for the 21st century EU needs to be fit for purpose. Important to have an experienced hand to cultivate our EU institutions.'
b'My full suport to President @vonderleyen: we need a #EuropeanGreenDeal and lead the way to become the first climate-neutral continent.'

b'Holocaust is not a tragedy of one nation but a tragedy of us all. History of \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 has also its dark moments we don\xe2\x80\x99t like to hear about. We must be vigilant when even today someone spreads hatred against minorities & do not allow such tragedies happen again. #HolocaustMemorialDay https://t.co/B0ESMZcR07'

b'I welcome today\xe2\x80\x99s prisoners exchange between #Ukraine and #Russia. Evidence that meaningful dialogue is possible and brings results. I hope this dynamics helps advance a peaceful solution to the conflict.'

b'Always good to meet and discuss with colleagues. I enjoyed friendly and honest discussions today in Warsaw with Presidents @BorutPahor, Kersti Kaljulaid, Salome Zourabichvili, Frank-Walter Steinmeier, Egils Levits & Volodymyr Zelensky. https://t.co/0O3NDQ4D7e'

b'The horrors of #WW2 remind us how important it is for Europe to stay together, united and strong, not to allow war and conflicts return to our continent. We must not retreat in the face of evil but to overcome it. https://t.co/j3x76zo01r'

b'I stand with the Polish people on the day of commemoration of the beggining of #WW2, started by aggression and occupation of #Poland 80 yrs ago. Honoured 2 be in Warsaw with President Duda today. We shall never forget. https://t.co/qGzArW7Yfa'

b'#Bratislava and #Vienna closest capitals in Europe with excellent relations between us. 30 years of freedom, democracy & rule of law good reason to avoid any offers from populists and nationalists in addressing challenges we face. Hope to discuss more w/ @vanderbellen in \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0. https://t.co/Ce27QnFsa0'

b"#Austria & #Slovakia close partners in the region, sharing same values & support for strong and united Europe.\xc2\xa0Glad to support President  @vanderbellen's initiative for more climate ambition. https://t.co/ZKzd8vyDus"
b'Travelling green by train from Bratislava to Vienna to meet President @vanderbellen. Very much looking forward to our discussions. https://t.co/Dm120XBm3q'

b'I thank all those who 75 years ago found the strength, dedication and courage to defend and fight for humanity, for our country and freedom of its citizens. I will never forget the heroes of 1944 Slovak National Uprising. https://t.co/twSxKQ4LWH'

b'I discussed #Brexit with Angela Merkel. We agreed we need to listen to each other, to preserve our EU unity but also to refrain from escalating negative emotions in our dialogue with the UK. Future of Europe lies in unity and cooperation, not in in building new walls and borders. https://t.co/usycVAZIjA'

b'On the day when Warsaw pact troops invaded Czechoslovakia and by the memorial of victims of Berlin wall, I honored those who died because of their desire to live in dignity, freedom & democracy. Their legacy reminds us never to take these values for granted and to protect them. https://t.co/15YrtzI33R'

b'Slovakia and Germany know the price of divided Europe. We agreed with President Steinmeier that 30 years after the fall of Berlin wall and Velvet revolution, it is our duty to work together on overcoming divisions in the EU & to keep it strong and united. https://t.co/ylnsFx8CpT'

b'Honoured to receive the European Prize for Political Culture on behalf of all, who believe in decency & democratic principles to replace hatred, populism and extremism and renew trust, understanding & solidarity. https://t.co/yrLpsvC1F6'

b'Dnes som si vo franc\xc3\xbazskom meste\xc4\x8dku Meudon uctila pamiatku M.R. \xc5\xa0tef\xc3\xa1nika \xe2\x80\x93 vedca, gener\xc3\xa1la, zakladate\xc4\xbea \xc4\x8ceskoslovenska, no najm\xc3\xa4 \xc4\x8dloveka, ktor\xc3\xbd n\xc3\xa1m uk\xc3\xa1zal, \xc5\xbee je mo\xc5\xben\xc3\xa9 by\xc5\xa5 oddan\xc3\xbdm vlastencom a z\xc3\xa1rove\xc5\x88 presved\xc4\x8den\xc3\xbdm Eur\xc3\xb3panom. https://t.co/6rZq536NzH'

b'Tolerance and compassion shall always prevail over hate, violence and fear.\xc2\xa0Laying flowers at memorial place of Bataclan tragedy to pay respect to those who lost their lives due to extreme hatred against humanity. https://t.co/r1fzVmSriE'

b'Trust through understanding and cooperation, in respect of rule of law & EU values - the best way to overcome east-west divisions. Many priorities we can work together on - social justice to complement EU freedoms & green transition to make the EU global leader. @EmmanuelMacron https://t.co/R24YZUFxx0'

b'Congratulations to Ursula @vonderleyen, new President-elect of @EU_Commission. I wish you a lot of strength and success in keeping EU united, committed to its democratic values and ready to tackle climate change! Good luck Madam President!'

b'With @AndrzejDuda we discussed many topics incl. regional cooperation, environmental protection, judiciary reforms, our relations with Russia & need to support Ukraine. We agreed it is important to build on what we share and to communicate openly where our opinions differ. https://t.co/M8jy25IoeN'

b'Today\xe2\x80\x99s trip to Poland completes series of my visits in V4 countries. Slovakia and Poland share important economic ties but also common history of fighting for freedom & democracy. This is what I would like to talk about with President  @AndrzejDuda and PM @MorawieckiM'

b'Personally honoured to pay tribute to the first democratically elected President of Hungary Mr. Arp\xc3\xa1d G\xc3\xb6ncz.\xc2\xa0Let his words about \xe2\x80\x9cfreedom of thought, freedom of faith, and social justice with human rights\xe2\x80\x9d speak to us today. They must never stop. https://t.co/Fjt2lLDXQq'

b'Meeting PM Viktor Orb\xc3\xa1n. Appreciate good cooperation of our governments. Our countries closely connected through our Slovak and Hungarian minorities. Values of liberal democracy, plurality & solidarity - essential the best guarantee for well-being of both minority and majority. https://t.co/TpNIDq1oeH'

b"Have been received by President J\xc3\xa1nos \xc3\x81der with very warm welcome. Discussed our neighborly relations & common priority #climatecrisis. My position is clear: as V4 we need to revive its original purpose (EU unity) \ndefend values of freedom and democracy and improve it's image. https://t.co/8bNr6fSt76"

b'On my way to Budapest for my next visit abroad. Good neighbourly relations is my priority. Meeting President J\xc3\xa1nos \xc3\x81der and PM Viktor Orb\xc3\xa1n. Later representatives of Slovak minority and honouring former President \xc3\x81rp\xc3\xa1d G\xc3\xb6ncz. \xc3\x96rvendek, Magyarorsz\xc3\xa1g!'

b'I confirmed today w/ PM @PellegriniP_ & Speaker of the Parliament A. Danko in our joint declaration that there must not be any doubt about pro-European and pro-Atlantic orientation of Slovakia. I expect we will respect this commitment and live up to it. https://t.co/rFqE8GcPGh'

b'V\xc3\xbdborn\xc3\xa1 diskusia s na\xc5\xa1imi krajanmi dnes ve\xc4\x8der v Bruseli. \xc4\x8eakujem, \xc5\xbee rob\xc3\xadte Slovensku dobr\xc3\xa9 meno. Ver\xc3\xadm, \xc5\xbee aj s va\xc5\xa1ou pomocou dok\xc3\xa1\xc5\xbeeme zmeni\xc5\xa5 na\xc5\xa1u krajinu. https://t.co/6GI7e8K2W3'

b'Appreciate warm and friendly meeting with EC President @JunckerEU today in Brussels. Slovakia remembers your long term effort in overcoming dividing lines in Europe. Our future is in strong and united EU. We need to cooperate more across regional and historical divisions. https://t.co/mJYBAPTYOO'

b'I had a very productive meeting with NATO SG @jensstoltenberg. We discussed Slovakia\xe2\x80\x99s commitments to reach 2% in 2022, to continue with our contribution to enhanced Forward Presence and to support Ukraine. I was glad to hear that Slovakia is a reliable & responsible ally. https://t.co/Q7zH9ZjCfT'

b'After Prague, my second trip goes to Brussels. Because our prosperity and security are firmly bound to EU & NATO. Looking forward to meet King Philippe of Belgium, NATO Secretary General @jensstoltenberg and President of European Commission @JunckerEU. https://t.co/lQuPnmSiN0'

b'Nikdy nesmieme zabudn\xc3\xba\xc5\xa5 na obete fa\xc5\xa1izmu a hrdinstvo \xc4\xbeud\xc3\xad, ktor\xc3\xad bojovali za na\xc5\xa1u slobodu. #StretnutieGener\xc3\xa1ci\xc3\xad #Kali\xc5\xa1te https://t.co/t1HmtIo66U'

b'This year, Slovaks and Czechs are remembering 30th anniversary of Velvet revolution. I was humbled to lay wreath on Vaclav Havel\xe2\x80\x99s grave. His relentless fight for freedom & democracy has always been an inspiration to me. https://t.co/X6dCKkaaP8'

b'My first official visit goes to Czech republic. Tradition? More of a natural choice. Looking forward to meet President @MZemanOficialni, President of the Senate @JardaKuberaODS and President of the Chamber of Deputies @vondraczech. https://t.co/V7Kbj7V6Aj'
b"I didn't come to govern but to serve. I am offering my wisdom, heart and hands. \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 https://t.co/1lSga4eNAp"

b'Thank you very much! I am humbled and honoured by this award. It serves as an encouragement for my future work. \xf0\x9f\x87\xaa\xf0\x9f\x87\xba\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 @euronews, #ELA19 https://t.co/P7214JDklW'

b'I would like to extend my congratulations to Volodymyr #Zelenskiy on his election victory. I look forward to our discussions and mutual cooperation. You can count on Slovakia\xe2\x80\x99s support for the European future of Ukraine.  @zeteam_official \xf0\x9f\x87\xba\xf0\x9f\x87\xa6\xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0\xf0\x9f\x87\xaa\xf0\x9f\x87\xba'
b'RT @EmmanuelMacron: Notre-Dame is aflame. Great emotion for the whole nation. Our thoughts go out to all Catholics and to the French people\xe2\x80\xa6'

b'I am heartbroken by the sight of Notre-Dame Cathedral burning. Slovakia stands with Paris and France tonight. \xf0\x9f\x87\xab\xf0\x9f\x87\xb7 \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 \xf0\x9f\x87\xaa\xf0\x9f\x87\xba'

b'Mon c\xc5\x93ur se brise \xc3\xa0 la vue de la cath\xc3\xa9drale Notre dame en feu. La Slovaquie marche aux c\xc3\xb4t\xc3\xa9s de Paris et de la France ce soir. \xf0\x9f\x87\xab\xf0\x9f\x87\xb7 \xf0\x9f\x87\xb8\xf0\x9f\x87\xb0 \xf0\x9f\x87\xaa\xf0\x9f\x87\xba'
